thoughts: AWK is a powerful text processing language.
AMPL is a high-level modeling language.
Unix philosophy emphasizes the use of small, modular tools.
Java is a popular programming language known for its portability.
Perl emphasizes practicality and ease of use.
Apache is a widely-used web server software.
Python is known for its simplicity and readability.
NodeJS allows for server-side JavaScript programming.
MySQL is a popular relational database management system.
MongoDB is a flexible NoSQL database.
React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
CSS-in-JS allows for styling components with JavaScript.
Test-Driven Development (TDD) is a software development process that relies on writing tests before writing code.
Extreme Programming (XP) emphasizes customer satisfaction and team collaboration.
Software Design Patterns provide reusable solutions to common problems in software design.
JUnit is a popular testing framework for Java.
Object-Oriented Design focuses on organizing software into objects and classes.
Graphical User Interface (GUI) Design involves designing interfaces for software applications.
Jazz Guitar is a genre of music known for its improvisation and complexity.
Education is essential for personal and societal development.
Algorithms are step-by-step procedures for solving problems.
Quicksort is an efficient sorting algorithm.
Hoare Logic is a formal system for reasoning about computer programs.
Authors play a vital role in sharing knowledge and storytelling.
Code Kata are exercises for practicing coding skills.
Ruby is a dynamic programming language known for its simplicity and productivity.
Pragmatic Programming emphasizes practicality and efficiency.
TeX Computer Typesetting is a system for typesetting documents with high-quality typography.
Algorithms are essential for solving computational problems.
Authors contribute to the dissemination of knowledge.
JavaScript is a versatile programming language used for web development.
CSS defines the presentation of HTML elements on web pages.
HTML provides the structure for web pages.
Design Systems help maintain consistency and efficiency in UI/UX design.
Typescript is a statically typed superset of JavaScript.
Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) offer a native app-like experience on the web.
